entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming west 20 late this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 11 this evening and minus 18 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Flurries ending in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 15. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Clearing overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 13 in the evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
